mapper.select: select tbl_order.order_id, tbl_order.user_id, tbl_order.total_cost, tbl_order.cooking_status, tbl_order_detail.order_detail_id, tbl_order_detail.message, tbl_menu.menu_name, tbl_menu.menu_price, tbl_user.user_name, tbl_user.user_type from tbl_order inner join tbl_order_detail on tbl_order.order_id = tbl_order_detail.order_id inner join tbl_user on tbl_order.user_id = tbl_user.user_id inner join tbl_menu on tbl_order_detail.menu_id = tbl_menu.menu_id;
select order_detail_id, cooking_status from tbl_order_detail where order_detail_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(user_id, total_cost, cooking_status) values (#{user_id}, #{total_cost}, #{cooking_status})
